mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_tb ( member_code_seq, member_email, member_password, member_name, member_phone, member_rec_code, member_sms_agree, member_email_agree ) VALUES ( 'member_code_sq' || TO_CHAR(member_code_sq.nextval), #{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberRecCode}, #{memberSmsAgree}, #{memberEmailAgree} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM member_tb WHERE member_email=#{email}
SELECT member_password FROM member_tb WHERE member_email=#{email}
SELECT member_code_seq FROM member_tb WHERE member_email=#{memberEmail}
SELECT member_name FROM member_tb WHERE member_code_seq=#{code}
SELECT member_code_seq, member_email, member_name, member_phone, member_login, member_profile, member_birth, member_gender, member_grade FROM member_tb WHERE member_code_seq=#{code}
